name: Education Outcome Tracker for Transcript
description: Education Outcome Tracker for Transcript flags grades and proctors LMS activity; applies decision gates and observability; orchestrates via Analytics Lake to reduce absenteeism.

steps.name: Assessment Intake
steps.description: Collect, validate and normalize content metadata from SIS; attach a runId and timestamp for traceability.

steps.name: Retrieve
steps.description: Execute retrieve phase for the RAG pattern: persist interim state, enforce guardrails, and emit structured JSON results.

steps.name: Ground
steps.description: Execute ground phase for the RAG pattern: persist interim state, enforce guardrails, and emit structured JSON results.

steps.name: Readiness Check
steps.description: Readiness Check across joined datasets; branch on thresholds using decision gates; write metrics (success/error counts) for observability.

steps.name: Practice Recommendation
steps.description: Practice Recommendation across joined datasets; branch on thresholds using decision gates; write metrics (success/error counts) for observability.

steps.name: Progress Review
steps.description: Progress Review across joined datasets; branch on thresholds using decision gates; write metrics (success/error counts) for observability.

steps.name: Parent/Student Notification
steps.description: Assemble final payload with status, artifacts, KPIs and audit trail; store to Identity/SSO; return response JSON for the client.
